Trade/Device Name(s): Thermo Scientific CEDIA Multi-Drug OFT Calibrators
Submitter Information: Thermo Fisher Scientific, Clinical Diagnostic Division
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Thermo Scientific CEDIA Multi-Drug OFT Calibrators used to calibrate drugs of abuse in oral fluid on the MGC 240 analyzer.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use in the calibration of d-Amphetamine, Benzoylecgonine, Morphine, and Phencyclidine (PCP) in human oral fluid when used with CEDIA OFT assays on the MGC 240 analyzer; for clinical laboratory use only.
